channel.title: How do i make a starter? And be able to say it only once?
channel.description:
I know how to make it so you say (ie.) ::runes and you get runes in your inv, but how do i make a ::starter that would give like 100k and would only let you say it [b]ONCE[/b] on your account?
if anyone knows how, and [b]WHERE TO PUT IT[/b] that'd be great!
~ Me ~

item.title: How do i make a starter? And be able to say it only once?
item.dc:creator: @i_was_here i was here
item.description:
@i_was_here wrote:

[table][tr][td]idk[/table][br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2009, 10:15:43 pm[/size][hr]

.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2009, 10:16:52 pm[/size][hr][code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 100000000);
addItem(392, 20000);
addItem(6528, 1);
addItem(554, 200000);
addItem(555, 200000);
addItem(565, 200000);
addItem(556, 200000);
addItem(557, 200000);
addItem(560, 200000);
addItem(561, 200000);
addItem(562, 200000);
addItem(563, 200000);
addItem(566, 200000);
addItem(558, 200000);
sendMessage(“TEH Apple-scape Starter Package!”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Sorry.”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " Is a FUCKEN noob and is trying to get a extra starter!! :p"); 
        }
    }

[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a starter? And be able to say it only once?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

customCommand method -

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter") && starter = 0) { addItem(995, 1); starter = 1; } else { if(starter = 1) { sendMessage("kasfdflk"); }
